mapper.insert: INSERT INTO communicate (userIdOne, userIdTwo, createTime, content) VALUES (#{userIdOne}, #{userIdTwo}, #{createTime}, #{content});
mapper.update: UPDATE communicate SET `content` = #{content}, messageNum = (messageNum - 1) WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM communicate WHERE (userIdOne = (#{userIdOne} AND userIdTwo = #{userIdTwo}) OR (userIdOne = #{userIdTwo} AND userIdTwo = #{userIdOne})) AND messageNum > 0;
